mapper.select: SELECT vstb.space_id, vstb.tenant_id, vst.app_id FROM ${tablePrefix}social_tenant vst LEFT JOIN ${tablePrefix}social_tenant_bind vstb ON vst.tenant_id = vstb.tenant_id AND ((vstb.app_id is NULL ) OR (vst.app_id = vstb.app_id)) WHERE vstb.space_id = #{spaceId}

SELECT vstb.space_id, vst.tenant_id, vst.app_id, vst.platform, vst.app_type, vst.auth_mode, vst.auth_info AS auth_info_str, vst.status FROM ${tablePrefix}social_tenant_bind vstb, ${tablePrefix}social_tenant vst WHERE vstb.tenant_id = vst.tenant_id AND vstb.app_id = vst.app_id AND vstb.space_id = #{spaceId}
AND vst.platform = #{platform}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM ${tablePrefix}social_tenant_bind WHERE tenant_id = #{tenantId} AND space_id = #{spaceId}
mapper.select: SELECT * from ${tablePrefix}social_tenant_bind WHERE space_id = #{spaceId} AND tenant_id = #{tenantId}
